===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|かたかな|acc=3|acc2=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5|acc2_ref=NHK,SMK5}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かたかな|カタカナ|kyu=片假名}}

# A set of [[Japanese]] [[syllabary]] [[characters]], secondary to [[hiragana]], derived from portions of Chinese characters whose sounds approximate the Japanese sound being represented. Katakana is mostly used for transliteration from Western languages.
